lines.text:
[about to shoot a man carrying a garbage can]
Garbage day!
[first lines]
Hello, Ricky. I'm your court appointed therapist. My name is Dr. Henry Bloom. You can call me Henry, or if you want, you can just call me Doc.
Fuck off... Doc!
I hate you Ricky! I hate you!
Punish!

[gulps]
Uh-oh.

My old lady couldn't afford to send me to college. So I got a job. I was washing dishes, dumping trash... all that sort of shit. I think you're gonna like this next part. It sounded like some squirrel getting his nuts squeezed.
Hey, what the Hell is all that noise out there?

[shoots him]
Motherfucker.
You're good doc, real good. But I know all the moves, I could squash you like a bug.
You don't frighten me, Ricky.
Not yet.
Let's go, start the movie! Mooovie, mooovie!
What did you say this movie was about again?
Oh, it's great. It's about this guy who dresses up like Santa Claus and kills people.
What?
I'm not one for games Ricky. I'm a professional. My time is very valuable.
Oh? And mine isn't?
Your time is running out son. I'm your last chance.
Oh yeah?
Yeah.
Well, what makes you think you can bullshit your way into my head? Like every other pencil-neck piece of shit!
That bastard. He left us out there to die!
That was so long ago. How could you possibly remember all that?
Because... I was there. You know, I don't like your attitude, Bloom!
My attitude is not the issue here, Mr. Caldwell.
Oh yeah, I forgot. You in a hurry, Doc? Am I wasting your valuable time?

It was something to see. Cops stopping Santas everywhere from here to the state line. But that didn't matter to Billy. He knew the roads, the shortcuts. He knew exactly where he was going, and nothing was going to stop him!
[young Ricky has run over Paula's abusive boyfriend with a car]
Thank you.
Tell me about Jennifer.
Eat shit!
Richard, are you there? You come and face me! Richard, I am not afraid of you. You are weak, just like your brother. And like your brother, you must be punished!
[Ricky enters. Mother Superior brandishes a knife]
You're looking well.
I am your Mother Superior, and I raised you from a child! I order you to put that weapon down and take your punishment!
No more punishment.
You are being very, very naughty!
Naughty this!
[swings his axe at Mother Superior]
You tend to get paranoid when everyone around you gets dead.

[after Ricky has told the story of how he killed a loan shark]
Why in the hell is there no mention of these incidents in my notes? Oh, my god! The State Review Board will certainly find out my opinions on...
[wipes his face with a handkerchief, then realises it has a red pattern embroidered in it, which would cause Ricky to go crazy. He quickly hides it away]
Well, we've covered a lot of ground today.
You didn't think...
Certainly more than I...
I was going to let him get away with it.
Anticipated...
Did you, Doc? No way! Too many people get away with that kind of shit.
[looks up to the heavens]
Punishment!
Discipline.
You're really starting to get to me, Doc.
Then tell me about Jennifer.
Eat shit!
That's enough.
Oh, it speaks!
I said, that's enough.
Listen Bud... that's what she said when I fucker her brains out on the backseat of old Red here.

[Wielding an axe]
Oh Mother Superior! I've got a present for you!

[to the man sitting next to him in the theatre]
This movie's so bogus. It really is. Watch this - the guy's going to go down into the basement without a flashlight. Never mind the fact that everyone else in the movie's dead! Next thing you know...
[the loudmouth looks up to see the man gone and Ricky in his place]

[whispers]
Shh! Naughty.
[Ricky begins to strangle the loudmouth]
[Ricky shoots the grill of a red car, causing it to flip over and explode]
BINGO!
